cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is a less-than-immaculate 2005 Toyota Matrix with only 100000 miles on it. Cloth seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2009 Honda Accord with only 75000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
